Dialogue.TextLine: This is an absolute test. Its purpose it to be a test.....

hi. My name is Unlimited Trees, the coolest person and coolest main character.
Right now I am actually asleep and I have no idea how you even are reading this.
If you really are there, I guess I could tell you a story.
It all started a couple days ago. I had just woken up from some weird bright light. Having nothing to do, I just went on with my day.
I spent about 17 hours doing nothing, but then I realized that I hadn't had food since I'd woken up.
I kept thinking about hamburgers, ending up spending about a month doing absolutely nothing but thinking of food. After quiet awhile, I gained the courage to search for a good grub.
Sadly for me, I had no money whatsoever. This was a problem, but then I discovered some people pushing a perfectly good tray of hamburgers into a movie studio.
As the next best logical thing, I went on my way to steal their personal property. That's all that happened to the story. Nothing more, don't look into it.

Come see the beautiful sights, meet the booming community, and perhaps even purchase some goodies!
Before you enter, here's a good tip... it's always good to remember how to Swap Characters!
Whether you're using the A key, the Y button, or the Left Shoulder Button, you are able to swap which character you control in your party!
Everyone has something which makes them different, so it's good to try out a different party member sometimes!
Hello traveler, you're heading towards the deeper part of the Carnival, and we hope you're enjoying your stay~
Before you head off, it's best to remember how to swap party members.
In case you don't remember, you can swap your character by pressing either the A key on the keyboard, or both the Y button and left shoulder button on a controller!
We wish you luck!

Hello.
We really have to congratulate you on making this far.
Throughout all of our tests, plenty have failed short, but to see you finally succeed... has brought us great joy.
Now, you might be hoping for some sort of explanation for the... events which have occured. Well, since you were willing enough to get this far, we'll tell you.
You are having a bad dream.
Although certain things may exist in the "real world", and all of the people you have met are indeed real, however...
All the previous events were conjured up for a little experiment with your behavior, And you've past the test.
Now... as for what is next...
To make sure this experiment wasn't merely a fluke, we will put you through the same experience, again and again.
When the time comes, you will wake up with a fresh start, and the story can begin.
For now, we hope that you enjoy your time in our little experiment.
Good night.

It's finally resting.

hello i am unlimited trees, maker of video games and coolest living entity
originally i wanted to do this video using a strange voice, but i aint got time for that
so, with my text and spaghetti hamburger powers, i shall present to u: me presentation
so, it has been quite awhile since my last update on my video game, UNITRES..over half a year in fact.
a ton has changed over the past couple of months, so i decided i shall make a cool video to show you some stuff ive done
so i hope you'll like some of the stuff ive got to show. anyways, let us begin with the GAMEPLAY
originally, the gameplay was a lot more slower paced. there also wasn't a whole lot of options on how you moved
you only stayed at one constant speed for most of the game, and the only way you could move faster was with the help of various objects which would take control away
however, in the newest version of the game, every character has been sped up a bit. not only that, but a new feature has been implemented called directional attacks.
Basically, if you hold a direction while you attack, not only will you get an extra reach in your attack, but youll also perform a sort of dash
when holding left/right, u get a forward dash in the direction you are holding. if youre holding up/down, you get a sort of jump boost in the opposite direction
you can use the horizontal and vertical attacks separately, which can be used to your advantage when moving around levels
this new way of attacking should make the gameplay both more interesting, but also hopefully a lot more fun and fast.
not only does the dash make you faster, but now a lot of gimmicks in the game have been fixed to where you now have absolute control over the player
i hope these new changes and additions make the game a lot more interesting. they may be small but i feel more convident in the gameplay.
next, i shall talk about the levels
originally, this update was going to just be 1 new level and some minor updates to the original levels
however, I've decided on not only including this level, but a whole new campaign with new levels
There are going to be 3 fully original levels, along with 3 "remixed" versions of previous levels.
I've spent a lot of time both creating the artwork for these levels and coming up with the general level design, that I'm still not even finished with these new levels.
However, I hope they'll be interesting for you to go through. Hopefully the final game will have tons of stuff to do and consume.
as for all the original levels, i was pretty disappointed with them when i initially released them
i wasn't able to include some things which I wanted to include, and some parts of them are outright unfinished
Not only that, but with the new gameplay features and the way that everything was essentially sped-up, some levels became straight up broken.
And now compared to the new levels, a few of the levels just don't really hold up anymore.
So, not only am I doing some updates to some of the original levels, but some levels will also be completely redone from scratch to fit the new standards.
the main level im going to show off is dreamscape distance. originally, both of the level's sections were short and linear, and just weren't very interesting.
now, the level is 4 times as large as it originally was, with tons of paths to take and secrets to be found. ive also added a lot more gimmicks and such to mess around with.
i'm really proud of the new art i've made for the level and i hope it does a better job at being an introduction to the game and its world.
another level which is in the process of being remade is tranquil trench section 1, which though isnt complete yet, will have various improvements
some improvements include better art design, more complex and interesting levels, more gimmicks, and some small extra details, such as rain.
thats all i have to say for the levels at the moment, theres still some work to be done, but i hope what ive shown off now will be quite interesting
not only are levels going to recieve makeovers, but a lot of bosses will be redone aswell.
currently, the only boss which has recieved updates is the Trees boss, which has new moves and sprites
however, i plan on making the rest of the bosses both more interesting, more challenging, and also a bit more fair in some regards.
as for new bosses, there will be quite a few. not much progress has been done outside of art, but i will say there's at least one new boss has some progress ingame
the boss for perfect city section 1 has some progress done, though it still requires a lot of work.
i hope that, once the new bosses are finished, they will be very fun and interesting. it will just take a bit of time to focus on the levels first.
levels and bosses aren't the only things recieving updates, the 3 main characters are recieving updates aswell.
first off, the main gamer and coolest person, unlimited trees, has recieved a bit of a redesign.
most of his sprites have been completely redrawn, though currently there's still some which will be recieving updates later.
ive found this new design to be a lot more appealing and fun to draw and im overall proud of the design, so i hope you like it.
then there's the blue character. their design hasn't been changed much, however the sprites themselves have recieved a major update in terms of both shading and the colors.
finally, the red character has recieved a complete overhaul in design. i wasn't satisfyed with their original design, so i completely rid both the design and the sprites.
im not the best when it comes to designing more "cute" characters, but i think i like the look of this character.
they have completely new sprites which i find to be quite nice. and aside from the art, the character ingame has been made to be a lot more faster and fun to play.
something to point out, is that there will be some cameos in the game, so i hope you will be looking forward to that.
also speaking of art...
the original release of the game was very rushed. lots of things were made very quickly to fit the deadline. so im hoping this update will look a lot better when it comes out.
my artstyle has grown over the years, and i've been getting better and better as time goes on.
it really feels like yesterday when i struggled to make the pepsi can sprites for Pepsi in Sonic 1, so i hope you like the work ive put into making this game look the way it does.
however, enough about what i've done, i want to talk about something else artwise. I've always considered music to be art, so I'm going to talk about the music of this game.
I ain't a composer myself, though I hope to learn to be one. but for this game's music, I asked various music composers to join the project.
They've put a lot of effort into all the tracks in this game, and I'm glad to say there will be plenty more tracks to listen to.
the original release of the game was quite wacky, as they weren't able to finish all the tracks in time. with this update, however, i hope we'll be able to provide a soundtrack youll enjoy.
the current team of composers consist of RRThiel, A-S-H, Scooblee, CosmicGem, and newcomers MrSauceman, [c], MiniMacro, and Crash
Not only that, but a track from littlelamp100 will appear in the game aswell, who made a pretty cool song
all of these people have done an amazing job, even if some of them have only composed one or two tracks, they deserve tons of recognition for all the work they put into this project.
i hope you support their work, and i hope you will enjoy the work they've done for this game.
anyways, with that out of the way, it is time for me to talk about the big thing: the release date
originally, i intended this to just be one tiny update with like 2 new levels, some bug fixes, and finished music.
however, as the scope grew larger and larger, i knew i wouldn't be able to get this game done within this year.

so, the final release date is going to be on
May 9, 2020.
it's going to take quite awhile, and there's plenty of work to be done, but i hope the wait will be worth it...
however, until then, i do have something to hold you over...
i spent the past month or so trying to put together a small little playable demo for you guys.
it's pretty early indevelopment, and it only has 1 main level, but i hope it's enough to keep you satisfied for now.
it has both a tutorial zone, and the completely new version of Dreamscape Distance - Section 1.

Hey. It's nice to see you.
I've been having a hard time getting a good rest. Even with the longest nap in the world, I just can't seem to feel good.
So, I've got some stories I would like to share. Perhaps they will help me rest...
...and who knows, maybe you'll enjoy them.
So, just pick out a story and I'll read it to you.
A long time ago, a science facility was created around a mysterious orb, one which could control time and space.
This orb was specifically able to affect the environment, in both positive and negative ways. Nearly hundreds of scientists across the galaxy would come to see the orb.
However, one day, an experiment failed horribly, nearly killing all of the scientists, excpet for one small group.
With the facility in ruins, and no one to stop them, the group decided to take advantage of the orb, using it for their own personal gains.
However, not long after, the facility was discovered by a film company, who assumed the area to be abandoned.
The remaining scientists panicked, thinking they were to be convicted for what happened.
So in order to prevent anyone from getting access to the orb, they used its power to corrupt the matter of all surrounding beings, excluding themselves.
All of the film crew who had entered the building were corrupted into senseless beings who would attack anything they'd spot.
The scientists then used the orb to change the environment of the planet, making sure that anyone who dares to enter would be unable to find the facility.
They then made an escape to a hidden area of the planet, surviving off of old stock and hoping that not a single soul dares go looking for them.
With the hoard of lustful creatures wandering the facility, they knew they had to find someway of keeping them at bay.
So, every once in a while, the scientists would take their supply of food to the facility to keep the demons captivated.
And thus, the wicked scientists spent the rest of their lives hiding in fear. Praying they'd never be found, and that no one would ever get access to the orb again.
What a funny story. Wouldn't you agree?
That is all for this one, perhaps you would like to read another?
In a mostly unpopulated planet resides a greenhouse, occupied by one lone gardener.
This gardener would tend to the strange plantlife, treating each plant with the same amount of love a mother would give to her own children.
She enjoyed her work, getting up every day to take care of her family.
However, despite each morning being bright, she couldn't help but feel a bit of loneliness. No one has ever visited her planet, much less appreciated the garden she spent time on.
Even with the comfort of her plants, she couldn't help but wonder of the embrace of another soul.
The gardener would dream, sometimes thinking of the day visitors reach her home.
And on some nights, she'd dream of leaving the galaxy to find her soulmate, someone who would be able to share her world with.
Then, after countless dreams, she finally decided to go on a journey. With the ship she was born in, she took it to find any civilisations.
However, the beginning of her quest didnt go quite as planned. Her maps were outdated, and she was very unfamilar with the surrounding universe.
She quickly found herself lost, with no habitable land in site. It soon seemed like she was stuck in a never ending limbo.
With no direction to go, and no one there to help, she felt a deep sadness fill her.
"This is terrible! I wish I never left... I just want to be back home!" the lonely gardener cried.
But just as she lost all hope, she looked out the window to find that there was a planet nearby.
This planet appeared to be very advanced, with large cities poking right through the planet's atmosphere.
The gardener wiped her face, and quickly charged the ship toward the planet.
Once she landed, she became overwhelmed by the empowering size of the city.
The buildings were so tall that they reached outer space. There was infrastructure spanning all the way across the horizon line.
The gardener was star struck by all the people surrounding her. It felt as though she would constantly bump into someone new.
After a bit of wandering, she stumbled into a factory. This factory manufactured tons of military androids, each of them very sleek and powerful.
The gardener had her attention focused on one robot. This robot was blue, with a larged purple hat placed on their round head.
This robot was a brand new prototype of a soon to be massproduced version of the governing machines.
The gardener approached the robot kindly, asking for their name. The robot could not respond, but the gardener was able to make out its name from a label on its hat.
"You're quite the pretty lady! Would you mind showing me around the place?" asked the gardener. To her surprise, the robot nodded.
The robot then took the gardener across the world, showing her all the sites. The gardener couldn't help but stare at the robot's bright red eye.
"This has been a really fun trip... but I have to get home. Would you like to come with me and see my garden?" asked the gardener.
The robot nodded again, so the two of them traveled back to the gardener's home planet.
Once they arrived, the gardener gleefully showed the robot every part of the greenhouse.
Although it had a hard time grasping the new surroundings, the robot found itself enjoying the place.
By the end of the day, the gardener was quite exhausted. Both her and the robot began to rest as the planet's two suns began to set.
"You know... I wish each day could be just like now. Would you like to stay here... with me?" the gardener asked.
The robot nodded once more, they both couldn't be more happy.
After so long, it felt like the gardener finally had someone she could share her passion with.
No one knows where or when it came. But the carnival managed to bring itself into existence.
There really is nothing like it. The rides will send you into space, the lights will nearly blind you.
The performers will confuse you, yet bring you an odd bit of joy. The food gives a sweet sensation greater than the average candy bar.
And the magicians will make you question the reality you live in. Of course, the carnival is quite mystifying.
If you ask the right people, they'd say it felt as though the carnival just suddenly appeared in their galaxy.
And the lucky few who have managed to attend it multiple times will say that the carnivals felt the same.
No matter what planet you find it, it'll look nearly identical down to the very minute details.
But even with its strange reappearances, it's nearly impossible to pinpoint where it'll show up next.
Some have said they've seen the carnival in their dreams, and when they woke up they'd forget they were even asleep to begin with.
That's what's so intriguing about it. The carnival is confusing, but makes total sense.
When you're there, you can't help but smile, and even the most bluest of people can find themselves laughing like a child.
Someday, you will get a chance to go to the carnival. It may not be tomorrow, or next year, but everyone always will find their happiness.
In the very center of the universe, there exists a nearly empty, forgotten planet.
This planet only has one large land mass on top of a never-ending ocean.
No one had been on this planet for centuries... no one except for a lost little girl.
It's unknown how she got there, but she found herself stranded on the planet with no one to keep her safe.
Luckily, she's very smart. In under just a few short minutes she already had a shelter and materials to last a lifetime!
And not only is she smart, but there's a little something special about her.
The girl has superpowers, those which none had ever seen before!
She could run very fast, and with a bit of clever thinking she could even travel across dimensions with just a single movement.
Not only that, but she was nearly invincible. Even the greatest impacts would just cause her to get right back up.
There's one last thing that makes her unique. She's able to see figments of light, the type that is able to heal her and give her the strength she needs to take on her challenges.
It's quite incredible!
And to top it all off, she's quite noble.
With her powers, she uses them to save worlds.
Whether it be by stopping a corrupt power, reforming an entire solar system's government, or even by stopping natural disasters, she always tries her best.
But even when you're the greatest in the universe, things aren't easy. Not everyone could be saved.
Sometimes, a slight miscalculation could lead to the death of millions.
The girl knows that with her powers, she must do what's right.
But even the smartest minds don't know when to take care of themselves.
Every day for her, she gets up, travels across galaxies, stops terrible events, and goes back home.
It's very lonely on her planet.
But, despite it all, she never gives up. Never.
Never. Never. Never. Never. Never. Never. Never. Never. Never. Never. Never. Never. Never. Never.
Never.

Oh, look at you, you poor thing.
You spent so long trapped that you fought all this way just to meet again.
All that effort, forcing yourself into private territory. Hurting even the ones you sought to protect.
But let's not beat around the bush, we all know that it'll be for nothing.
You're only further delaying your freedom.
You can try making insignificant changes outside. You could even try breaking through the inside.
But just so you know, even after you manage to weaken us...
...you still won't wake up.
Now. Enough banter.
Let's have a bit of fun!
~Welcome to the Diamond Center~
Whether you go left or right, there is no wrong direction. Only follow your heart to reach your destination~
Have you tried riding the POLYCAR? It's both a great way of transportation, and a simple military weapon.
Just press the attack button inside the POLYCAR to shoot a pellet~ It's that easy!
One last momento to leave you with: Did you know that, in the Dream Realm, there's always something new to find?
Even those who spend an eternity here will always find themselves discovering new things~
That is all, we hope you have a good night~
(psst, did you remember how to shield? Remember the shield button!)
Are you feeling lost?
Some say, if you follow the stars, you'll find your heart's desires...
Did you know? It's always good to believe in yourself.
WARNING: UNKNOWN, DANGEROUS INDIVIDUALS ON THE LOSE! PROCEED WITH CAUTION
ONE INDIVIDUAL IS YELLOW BEING WITH LONG LIMBS. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.
OTHER CRIMINAL IS PINK INDIVIDUAL WHOSE MOTIVATIONS ARE UNKNOWN. BE SURE TO PREPARE TURRETS BEFORE APPROACHING.
IF IN DANGER, REMEMBER TO PRESS THE PARTY SWAP BUTTON TO SWAP PARTY MEMBERS.
WARNING: STAY AWAY FROM THE TRANQUIL TRENCH
THE LOST SOULS HAVE GONE RAMPANT, ATTEMPTS HAVE BEEN MADE TO BURN TO BURN THE AREA
PLEASE STAY AWAY AND LET IT STAY FORGOTTEN.
I was once an important sign, I told important info!
...but now, I've been retired... I just don't know what to do!
I guess I can tell you that pressing the attack button while holding a direction will give you a boost...
...who am I kidding, you probably already know that....
Have you ever felt unsafe in the Dream Realm?
Is there something following you that you wish to leave in the past?
Why not become a Turret Guard? Sign up is easy, as long as you're capable of the job.
After agreeing to the NDA, you'll be provided with your very own weapon kit!
The weapon kit is easy to use! Just press the Attack button while holding a direction.
Remember: Being a Turret Guard can make a huge difference in your night!
Do you know what day it is? It's your birthday! Happy Birthday!
Before eating your cake, always remember to practice your manners. Perhaps even teach your friends a lesson.
And we leave you with this: Shielding is the Gift only You can bare. Always treasure your shield button.
Technology is finally progressing! Ariel now introduces the plates of tomorrow! Introducing... the Ultra Launch Plate!
Using new miniature jet technology, the plate is able to be independant from the launch station, thus allowing for greater control!
Not only that, but the build quality is much greater, so the Ultra Launch Plate will last much longer even with intense use!
Come to Ariel's Ultra Plate Station at the Perfect City to purchase your very own luxury plate!
Inbetween the city and the Isolated Mountains, you'll find one of the most joyful attractions imaginable.
With rides which spiral into madness, traps which will twist your mind into terror...
...and cute magicians whose only hope is to entertain, it's quite easy to lose your sense of self in the CHAOTIC CARNIVAL!
Just head past the back exit of the Diamond Center to find the fun~
Have you ever wanted your own fountain? Just head forward to the Diamond Center's very own Glorious Fountain Shop!
These fountains are very classy. The water is quite powerful too. Just jump in for a splash!
Beware of the ground however, as the owners are very fond of their spikes...
You are now entering the Golden Trench, the worksite of the Isolated Mountains.
Be sure to say hello to all of the employees, they're quite friendly.
Also, don't worry about the oil pools. You can jump out of them fairly easily.
Head this way to enter the deeper part of the trench.
We're unsure what is causing the walls to shift, so please be careful.
Don't get stuck in the oil. We don't want a repeat of last time.
You are now exiting the Golden Trench.
Did you enjoy your stay? I hope you've appreciated the work we've put into this very area.
Before you leave, please do not tell anyone about the screams in the walls. They're just noises.
Here's an interesting fact about the Isolated Mountains...
Inside the mountains, some very unique material can be found...
These materials include stardust, dead crystals, and strangely, vinyl records.
However, what interests us more is the dark, oil-esque substance found deeper within the mountains.
This sort of oil can't be destroyed, can't be moved, and can't be lit on fire.
However, using our very own Golden Trench machinery, we were able to use the oil as an infinite source of fuel.
Isn't that quite extraordinary?
